#include <cmath>
#include <cstdio>
#include <vector>
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	long long int t,n,a[100001],i,max,min;

	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
			cin>>a[i];
		max=min=a[0];

		for ( i = 1; i < n; ++i)
		{
			if(a[i]>max)
				max = a[i];
			else if(a[i]<min)
				min = a[i];
		}

		if(max-min>1)
			printf("BAD\n");
		else
			printf("GOOD\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
